surface: horizontal brushed metal tabletop with soft cinematic reflections
background: cliffside terrace overlooking the ocean at golden hour, softly blurred
palette: deep emerald green blending into sapphire blue with glowing gold highlights
video_prompt: Extreme macro close-up of thick pearlescent slime with colorful iridescence and rainbow-like light shifts. New slime continuously arrives from just above the frame, folding over the existing slime in slow, rounded layers with subtle internal glow and rich saturated tones. Composition: perfectly centered macro framing; slime mound and folds stay in the exact center with wide empty margins on all sides; no drift to edges or corners; no off-center framing.
audio_prompt: Silky, smooth, thick slime ASMR sounds with soft rounded folds and slow, calm settling. Slightly moist, cohesive texture with gentle compression and smooth release. Studio-quality close-mic recording, no voice, no music, no ambience. Duration: 8 seconds.
